sentences.en: Archaeologist John Hale believes the answers lie deep underground.
sentences.cn: 考古学家约翰·黑尔相信,答案就埋藏在地下.

sentences.en: As an archaeologist, he works in the open all year round.
sentences.cn: 作为一名考古学家, 他常年在户外工作.

sentences.en: But I do not believe, as a field archaeologist, that we can use the scientific method to prove or disprove [them].
sentences.cn: 但作为一个在现场工作的考古学家，我不相信我们能用科学手段对它们进行证实或证伪”。

sentences.en: Carbon dating provides the archaeologist with a basic chronological framework.
sentences.cn: 碳元素年代测定法给考古学家提供了基本的年代框架.

sentences.en: Hawass, a famed archaeologist and Egyptologist, said the man's name is Imhesy.
sentences.cn: 哈瓦斯是著名的考古学家和埃及古物学家, 他说这名男子叫伊米艾斯.

sentences.en: He's an archaeologist and has been on a dig in Crete for the past year.
sentences.cn: 他是位考古学家，过去的一年都在参与克里特岛上的一项考古发掘工作。

sentences.en: In fact, she was an archaeologist.
sentences.cn: 其实她是一个考古学家。

sentences.en: Marcus Crawford , 28, is a qualified archaeologist in the UK cheat.
sentences.cn: 现年 28岁的英国男子马库斯·克劳福德是一名英俊的考古学家.

sentences.en: My uncle is a nonprofessional archaeologist.
sentences.cn: 我叔叔是个业余考古学家。

sentences.en: No, no, Mr. Wilson said you were quite the archaeologist. Please.
sentences.cn: 不, 不, 威尔逊先生说你在考古方面很有研究. 请.

sentences.en: So, Alex, are you still pretending to be an archaeologist?
sentences.cn: 所以亚力士, 你还在伪装考古学家 吗 ?

sentences.en: Somaliland's first archaeologist, Mire is now on a mission to preserve and protect what she says is a heritage at risk of disappearing.
sentences.cn: 作为索马里兰的第一个考古学家，沼泽湿地现在的任务是维持和保护她所说的具有消失危险的遗产。

sentences.en: Somebody asks why she looked for an archaeologist.
sentences.cn: 有人问她为什么找了一位考古学家.

sentences.en: The archaeologist dated the ruins as belonging to the early Minoan period.
sentences.cn: 这位考古学家确定该废墟属于早期弥诺斯时期.

sentences.en: The archaeologist estimated that the vase was 3 500 years old.
sentences.cn: 考古学家估计这个花瓶有3500年之久.

sentences.en: The archaeologist found a jade dress in a Han Dynasty tomb.
sentences.cn: 考古人员在一座汉墓中发现一件金缕玉衣.

sentences.en: The archaeologist have found several human skeletons.
sentences.cn: 考古学家已经发现几具人的骨骼.

sentences.en: The archaeologist reconstructed the broken ancient vase from its fragments.
sentences.cn: 这位考古学家将破碎的古瓶修复还原.

sentences.en: What turns a man of the cloth into an archaeologist?
sentences.cn: 是什么让一个牧师变成了考古学家？

words.tran_cn: [古] 考古学的；[古] 考古学上的
